tool_description: Analyzes existing resume content to identify strengths, weaknesses, missing sections, and improvement opportunities.

resume_text.description: Complete text content of the current resume

target_role.description: The job title or role the resume is being optimized for

industry.description: Target industry sector (technology, healthcare, finance, etc.)

error_messages: Insufficient resume content: Resume must contain at least basic contact information and one experience or education entry.
Unrecognizable format: Resume content appears corrupted or in an unsupported format.
Missing critical sections: Resume lacks essential sections like contact information or work experience.
usage: Provide complete resume text and target role to receive detailed analysis of content quality, structure, and areas needing improvement.

strengths.description: Identified strong points and effective sections in the resume

weaknesses.description: Areas that need improvement or are poorly presented

missing_sections.description: Important resume sections that are missing

improvement_suggestions.description: Specific recommendations for enhancing resume content
